Job Description: Job   Description      We are looking for Software Developers who are experts at programming using C# and Microsoft SQL Server. Experience in custom business applications would be a big plus   Framework: .Net    Essential Functions & Responsibilities     You will work closely with other developers to architect and build e-commerce, web and cloud solutions for client and our agency partner.   Work independently under guidance of the Project Manager and to complete the tasks timely with highest quality.   Ability to understand business requirement and convert it to technical specifications required for development.     Knowledge & Skills     At least 1 or 1+ years of relevant industry experience is required.   Experience developing web applications using a combination of technologies including .NET, MVC, Angular JS, HTML, J Querry, AJAX, JavaScript and frameworks, MySQL, web services.   Proficiency in ASP.NET and ASP.NET MVC.   Good Communication skills in English.   Bachelor/Master Degree in Computer Science/Engineering/Application
